pageContext.claim: “I don’t know about that. I haven’t seen it. What report is that? I haven’t seen that. I’ll look into that.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump denied knowing about a Washington Post report that national security adviser Michael Flynn had lied about his contacts with the Russian ambassador. It was later determined that Trump had already had a meeting with his aides to discuss the story and whether to fire Flynn before he made these remarks to the media.
